headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Type of creative assets that you want to share. Enum values: VIDEO , IMAGE , MUSIC Default value: VIDEO

parameters.name: material_ids
parameters.description: Material ID. Max size: 20 After successful sharing, the name of the shared creative materials will be copied in the shared advertiser account. Note : Currently, the sharing will only fail when there is a creative material with the same name as the material you want to share under the shared advertiser account.

parameters.name: shared_advertiser_ids
parameters.description: IDs of advertisers that you want to share creative materials with. Max size: 10.

fields.name: failed_infos
fields.description: Information about the failed sharing. Note : Currently, the sharing will only fail when there is a creative material with the same name as the material you want to share under the shared advertiser account.

fields.name: key
fields.description: Advertiser ID that you fail to share creative materials with.

fields.name: value
fields.description: Material IDs that you fail to share.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
